title: Coral-toned monochromatic festive makeup
text:
Is your festive makeup routine getting boring and monotonous? It’s time to add a fresh new colour to your kit. Think peaches and cream this festive season. The orange hue is flattering on almost all skin tones. The warmth of the orange brings out the best in people with yellow undertones.



A coral-toned makeup look is simple yet sexy, bold yet wearable, and extremely easy to work with. It’s perfect for the festive season as it brightens up your overall complexion. This easy monochromatic festive makeup look, which uses complementary hues of the same shade, is all the makeup inspiration you need this festive season.

Next Story : 9 ethnic styles you should try this festive season
